mapper.select: SELECT r.res_id -- 예약 id ,r.member_email -- 사용자 id ,c.car_name ,r.res_startDate -- 시작일 ,r.res_endDate -- 종료일 ,r.res_date -- 예약한 일자 ,r.res_totalPrice -- 총 대여 금액 ,r.res_place FROM reservation r join car c ON r.car_id = c.car_id WHERE member_email IN ( SELECT member_email FROM member WHERE member_email = #{member_email} ) ORDER BY res_id DESC;

SELECT * FROM reservation
WHERE
member_email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
car_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
res_place LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
res_date LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
ORDER BY res_id DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{listLimit}

SELECT COUNT(res_id) FROM reservation
WHERE
member_email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
car_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
res_place LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
res_date LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')

SELECT (SELECT SUM(res_totalPrice) FROM reservation) as totalSales , (SELECT COUNT(res_id) FROM reservation) as totalReservation , (SELECT SUM(res_totalPrice) FROM reservation WHERE res_date = date(now())) as todaySales , (SELECT COUNT(res_id) FROM reservation WHERE res_date = date(subdate(now(), interval 5 day))) as fiveDaysAgoReservation , (SELECT COUNT(res_id) FROM reservation WHERE res_date = date(subdate(now(), interval 4 day))) as fourDaysAgoReservation , (SELECT COUNT(res_id) FROM reservation WHERE res_date = date(subdate(now(), interval 3 day))) as threeDaysAgoReservation , (SELECT COUNT(res_id) FROM reservation WHERE res_date = date(subdate(now(), interval 2 day))) as twoDaysAgoReservation , (SELECT COUNT(res_id) FROM reservation WHERE res_date = date(subdate(now(), interval 1 day))) as oneDaysAgoReservation , (SELECT COUNT(res_id) FROM reservation WHERE res_date = date(now())) as todayReservation , (SELECT COUNT(board_progress) FROM mailform WHERE board_progress = "진행중") as totalUnansweredMailform , (SELECT COUNT(member_email) FROM member) as totalMember , (SELECT COUNT(member_email) FROM member where member_date = date(now())) as totayJoin , (SELECT COUNT(car_id) FROM car WHERE car_available = '1') as totalAvailableCar , (SELECT COUNT(car_id) FROM car WHERE car_available = '0') as totalShippedCar
